name: scary-face
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user frightens the foe with a scary face to sharply reduce its Speed stat.
